sections.heading: Repealed.Section 22-13B-2 - Repealed
sections.text:
History:Laws 1990 (1st S.S.), ch. 9, § 1; repealed by Laws 1990 (1st S.S.), ch. 9, § 13.

Repeals.— Laws 1990 (1st S.S.), ch. 9, § 13 repealed 22-13B-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1990 (1st S.S.), ch. 9, § 1, relating to the short title of the Twenty-First Century Education Act, effective July 1, 1998. For provisions of former section,seethe 1997 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
